#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int *a;
int main()
{
    int t;
    int n;

    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;a= new int[n];
        int i,maxm=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
            if(a[i]>maxm) maxm=a[i];
        }
        cout<<maxm<<endl;
    }
return 0;
}
